detail_desc: Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and ventilating mesh panels at the sides. 67% of the polyester is recycled.

Straight-cut, calf-length dress in woven fabric with a grandad collar and covered buttons at the top. Detachable tie belt at the waist and long, slightly wider sleeves with covered buttons at the narrow cuffs. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a cotton knit. Funnel collar with a wrapover front and decorative drawstring, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short shirt dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, buttons at the top, chest pockets and side pockets. Short cap sleeves, a seam with a drawstring below the bust and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Unlined.
Cropped, boxy-style sports top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a collar, flounce at the top, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with flounced, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Short, straight-cut dress in airy, sequined chiffon with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top and an opening at the top of the back. Long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs, a concealed zip in one side and a seam at the waist with a draped detail at the front. Gently frayed, raw edges. Lined.
Top in a soft, patterned viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and gathers at the sides for best fit.
Padded jacket with a detachable, padded hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, ribbed cuffs and an elasticated hem. Partly lined in fleece.
Sleeveless maxi dress in soft jersey with an open chest pocket and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Fine-knit, V-neck sweater vest in soft cotton.

Long-sleeved dress in sweatshirt fabric and a pair of leggings in organic cotton jersey. Dress with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), a rib-trimmed neckline and a gathered seam at the hem. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in a fine-knit viscose blend with an elasticated waist.
Knee-length football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and a print motif on one leg. Unlined.
Hair clips with a metal clip and decorative appliqué in the shape of watermelons with glitter.

Rigid bag in braided rattan with an imitation leather tab and metal twist lock. Detachable, adjustable shoulder strap with a carabiner hook at each end, and metal studs underneath. One inner compartment. Lined. Depth approx. 9 cm. Height approx. 14 cm. Width approx. 20 cm.
Jacquard-knit tube scarf with ribbed edges. Width 24 cm, circumference 48 cm.
Ankle-length dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and slits in the sides.
Knee-length dress in soft ribbed jersey with a deep V-neck with a twisted detail at the front for a draped look. Short sleeves, a seam under the bust and wrapover skirt.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave. Extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly with a button, diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets. Super skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
V-neck top in a cotton weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and flounces at the front.
Short-sleeved top in a rib knit with a V-neck, button placket and wide, ribbed hem.

Calf-length dress in a crisp cotton weave with a square neckline, smocking at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Short, voluminous puff sleeves with covered elastication at the shoulders and hems, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in a cotton weave with hole embroidery, narrow shoulder straps and flounces at the front.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in soft, ribbed jersey made from an organic cotton blend. Fitted top with a round neck. Leggings with a high, elasticated waist.
Fitted, cropped top in jersey made from a cotton blend.
Short, padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the sides of the hem. Lined.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Short-sleeved top in soft, organic slub cotton jersey with a button placket and open chest pocket.
Triangle bikini top with decorative straps at the hem, lined cups, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a plastic fastening at the back.

Ankle-length suit trousers in airy linen with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Fancy dress mask in plastic foam with an elastic strap and hook and loop fastening at the back.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with an all-over print. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a low neckline and draped front.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Sun hat in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Flounced brim with a decorative bow at the back, and ties under the chin. Lined. Width of brim approx. 4.5 cm.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a wrapover and buttons at the front. Lined.
Padded bomber jacket with a faux fur collar, zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, embroidered detail on the chest and short sleeves with small ribbed trims. Slits at the hem.
Chiffon dress with a wide neckline, small opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length, flounced sleeves, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.

department_name: Sneakers big girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Trainers with a padded edge and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Swim trousers and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Top in soft pile with a drawstring hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Parka in a woven modal blend with a soft, brushed finish. Hood, diagonal zip down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Long sleeves with a tab and D-rings. Unlined.

Sleeveless, calf-length jumpsuit in a viscose weave with a round neckline and decorative gathers at the front. V-neck at the back with a wrapover and concealed press-stud. Side pockets, and a gathered seam at the waist with concealed elastication and detachable tie belt.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined drawstring hood. Dropped shoulder seams, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Soft, non-wired lace bra with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Double, adjustable spaghetti straps, wide elastic at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Ankle-length dungarees in washed cotton denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps, an open chest pocket, side pockets and back pockets. Buttons at the sides and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Round sunglasses with slim metal and plastic frames, adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Knee-length cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband containing a concealed key pocket.

Short, cold shoulder dress in a crêpe weave with narrow, frilled shoulder straps and short sleeves. Frill-trimmed V-neck, buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Use these protective laundry bags when you wash your favourite garments in the washing machine. They will last longer! 2-pack. Size 40x50 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Boxy puffer jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Concealed elastication at the cuffs and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Sports set with a sports top and pair of sports shorts in fast-drying, functional fabric. Short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Soft, non-wired nursing bra in organic cotton jersey with lace details and lightly padded opening cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps, and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fleece gloves with soft ribbing at the cuffs.

Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a glittery finish. Strap over the foot with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the side. Imitation leather linings and insoles, and rubber soles. Heel 1.3 cm.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a low waist and lined gusset.

Calf-length dress in a shimmering metallic weave with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back and have a decorative tie detail at the top. Gently fitted at the top and an open section at the back. Lined.

Checked shirt in an airy viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Short-sleeved jersey top.

Studio Collection. Trousers in a jacquard weave with a slight shimmer. Regular waist with belt loops and a tailored waistband with a safety button on the inside. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Straight fit and extra-long legs with creases. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.

Low-cut body in microfibre with a light shaping effect on the waist and hips. Non-wired, push-up bra with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, and adjustable shoulder straps. Lined gusset and a high cut at the back. The body is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Body in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Shorts in a soft cotton piqué marl with a fly and press-stud, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Low-cut swimsuit with a cut-out section at the front, lightly padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust, and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif and lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue and lacing at the front. Linings and insoles in recycled polyester and rubber soles.
Hat in a double layer of marled, cotton-blend jersey.
Short-sleeved, fitted jersey top with a slightly deeper neckline.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some mohair and wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
High-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, curved seams at the back, front and back pockets and skinny legs.
